Class AbstractDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.AbstractDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    Base class to help implement data sources.

    2.0

    • Method Detail

      • getUserEventDAO

        public UserEventDAO getUserEventDAO()
        Default user-event DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements UserEventDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingUserEventDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getUserEventDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The user-event DAO.

      • getItemEventDAO

        public ItemEventDAO getItemEventDAO()
        Default item-event DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements ItemEventDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingItemEventDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getItemEventDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The item-event DAO.

      • getItemDAO

        public ItemDAO getItemDAO()
        Default item DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements ItemDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingItemDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getItemDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The user-event DAO.

      • getUserDAO

        public UserDAO getUserDAO()
        Default user DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements UserDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingUserDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getUserDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The user-event DAO.

      • configure

        public void configure(LenskitConfiguration config)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Configure LensKit to use this data set.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        config - A LensKit configuration. Bindings for this data source's data will be added to this configuration.
